page.title: 07Fishing by Peter Wilton.
page.content: I go fishing with my friend.We go to the River Fowey.It is a big river. The fish I catch are{Salmon}and {Trout.}The heaviest fish I have caught is a two pound Trout.The heaviest Salmon I have caught is one and a quater pounds. I have had my fishing rod since I was seven.I bought it at Trago Mills with my birthday money.It costs Â£31 it was made in Japan and it is 5\m long. I buy bait from Trago Mills.I use {maggots}and{worms.}I dig the worms out of the garden.I catch more fish with maggots. I usually go fishing on Sundays.I take a drink with me.I get home at tea-time. I think fishing is a good sport.We see lots of wildlife like squirrels, rabbits,foxes and birds.
